text:
Raveena, Govinda to collaborate

Actor Raveena Tandon is collaborating with Govinda after a decade for dance-based reality show ‘Shine of India’.

Tandon and Govinda worked together in a number of films including Dulhe Raja , Akhiyon Se Goli Maare , Anari No. 1 and Bade Miyan Chote Miyan among others.

“It’s like a cherry on the cake. Everyone talks about our timing. We share a common love for music and dance. We used to try to outdo each other, which got the best out of us,” Raveena said. The actor was last seen in Anurag Kashyap’s Bombay Velvet while Govinda’s final film was Kill Dil . — PTI
title: ENT-RAVEENA
